components.name: Stratio streaming Sink
components.description: The StratioStreaming Sink will insert flume events to an specific stream. The configuration is located in the flume config (see sample below.)

kafka.name: Kafka
kafka.description: Kafka brokers (comma separated list) where the Stratio Streaming/Kafka instance is running

zookeeper.name: Zookeeper
zookeeper.description: Zookeeper quorum where the Stratio Streaming/Zookeeper instance is running

batchSize.name: Batch size
batchSize.description: The size to batch insert statement. We recommend 100 as an optimum value to this property. Please do not forget increase the channel.capacity property on your channel component over the sink.batchSize property.

confFile.name: Configuration file
confFile.description: Path to a configuration file with initialization statements
